candidates.reason: The topic is about comparing electronic components using Altium 365, whereas the comment describes specific projects and components used in an intro to engineering class, without any direct relation to the topic.
candidates.comment: This one is getting into what we are studying now in chapter 5. The first project is a car light bulb and an LED that are flashing form the Mosfet connection and the use of 12 volts. The second one is a high sensitive fire detector, using and IR sensor to detect a fire, up close it activates quickly. The third one is a heat sensitive fan, this I could have used years ago for my intro to engineering class, it was one of our projects. He used a 5k NTC thermistor to actuate the fan circuit. It is actually really close to what I used in my intro to engineer course.
candidates.url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GbdF6th5PZk: 3 Mind-Blowing Mosfet Projects That Even Beginners Can Create!
